channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: X Is Working With a GOP Consulting Firm
item.description: Targeted Victory’s largest client is the Republican National Committee. It’s now fielding inquiries for X about Elon Musk’s standoff with Brazil.

item.title: Public EV startup with an indicted CEO is looking to raise an additional $100 million
item.description: It’s tempting to think the trend of EV startups merging with special purpose acquisition companies (SPACs) to go public has ended, seeing how many of ...

item.title: Best Overlanding Gear (2024): Tried and Tested Storage, Shovels, and Coolers
item.description: We traveled thousands of miles to bring you the best tires, tow straps, and tool kits to get you out there … and back again.

item.title: TechCrunch Minute: Canva faces backlash over price hikes
item.description: Some Canva customers are experiencing serious sticker shock, while the company is pointing to new AI features to justify the price hike. The company h...

item.title: All the Top New Gadgets at IFA 2024
item.description: A phone with magnetic mods, a new handheld gaming console, and a robot vacuum that can climb stairs. Here’s the best new gear announced at IFA in Berl...

item.title: The New Data Pipeline: Fivetran, DataStax and NEA are coming to TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
item.description: In the world of modern AI, data is more than just a resource — it’s the fundamental core that aligns decision-makers, supports processes and enables i...

item.title: Elektron Digitakt II Review: The Most Versatile Sampler and Sequencer
item.description: Even after seven years, the original Digitakt can still hold its own against modern samplers. The Digitakt II is better in almost every way.

item.title: Transport for London outages drag into weekend after cyberattack
item.description: In a brief update ahead of the weekend, the London transport network said it has no evidence yet that customer data was compromised. © 2024 TechCrunch...

item.title: The NSA Has a Podcast—Here's How to Decode It
item.description: The spy agency that dared not speak its name is now the Joe Rogan of the SIGINT set. And the pod's actually worth a listen.

item.title: Last call: Boost your brand by hosting a Side Event at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
